statements: SELECT * FROM voter_registration_information;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM voter_registration_information;
SELECT address FROM voter_registration_information WHERE voter_status = TRUE;
SELECT full_name, address FROM voter_registration_information WHERE date_of_birth > '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM voter_registration_information WHERE full_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM voter_registration_information WHERE voter_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM voter_registration_information WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT voter_id, full_name, address FROM voter_registration_information WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM voter_registration_information ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT full_name, address FROM voter_registration_information WHERE date_of_birth < '1985-01-01' AND voter_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM voter_registration WHERE voter_age > 18;
SELECT voter_id, voter_name, registration_date FROM voter_registration WHERE voter_age <= 25;
SELECT voter_name, voter_address FROM voter_registration WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT voter_name, registration_status FROM voter_registration INNER JOIN voter_history ON voter_registration.voter_id = voter_history.voter_id WHERE registration_status = 'active';
SELECT voter_name, voter_address, registration_date FROM voter_registration WHERE voter_age >= 30 ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM voter_registration WHERE voter_age > 18 ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT voter_name, voter_address FROM voter_registration WHERE voter_age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND voter_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT voter_id, registration_status FROM voter_history WHERE registration_status='ACTIVE' ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT voter_name, voter_address, registration_date FROM voter_registration WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01' AND registration_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT voter_id, registration_date FROM voter_history WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM registration_date) = 6;
SELECT * FROM voter_records;
SELECT voter_name, date_of_birth FROM voter_records WHERE registration_status = TRUE;
SELECT voter_id, voter_name, city, state FROM voter_records ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT voter_id, registration_date, voting_status FROM voter_history WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT vh.history_id, vr.voter_name, va.city FROM voter_history vh JOIN voter_records vr ON vh.voter_id = vr.voter_id JOIN voter_addresses va ON vr.voter_id = va.voter_id;
SELECT voter_id, voter_name, date_of_birth FROM voter_records WHERE registration_status = true;
SELECT * FROM voter_records WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';

SELECT vr.voter_name, vh.registration_date, va.city FROM voter_records vr JOIN voter_history vh ON vr.voter_id = vh.voter_id JOIN voter_addresses va ON va.voter_id = vr.voter_id WHERE vh.voting_status = false;
SELECT voter_name, city, state FROM voter_records JOIN voter_addresses ON voter_records.voter_id = voter_addresses.voter_id WHERE voter_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY state ASC;

SELECT voter_id, COUNT(history_id) AS total_history FROM voter_records LEFT JOIN voter_history ON voter_records.voter_id = voter_history.voter_id GROUP BY voter_id HAVING COUNT(history_id) > 1 ORDER BY total_history DESC;
SELECT * FROM voters;
SELECT voter_name, voter_address FROM voters WHERE voter_age > 30;
SELECT voter_id, voter_name FROM voters ORDER BY voter_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM voting_districts WHERE district_location = 'City Center';
SELECT v.voter_name, h.election_year FROM voters v JOIN voter_history h ON v.voter_id = h.voter_id;
SELECT * FROM voters ORDER BY voter_name DESC;
SELECT voter_name, voter_age FROM voters WHERE voter_age > 30;
SELECT center_name, district_name FROM voting_centers JOIN voting_districts ON voting_centers.district_id = voting_districts.district_id;
SELECT DISTINCT district_location FROM voting_districts;
SELECT voter_name, vote_status FROM voters JOIN voter_history ON voters.voter_id = voter_history.voter_id WHERE election_year = 2022;
SELECT * FROM voters;
SELECT first_name, last_name, city, state FROM voters WHERE state='CA';
SELECT voter_id, first_name, last_name, address, city, state FROM voters ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM voter_addresses WHERE state='NY';
SELECT preference_id, voter_id, prefer_sms, prefer_email, prefer_mail FROM voter_preferences WHERE prefer_sms=TRUE;
SELECT * FROM voters WHERE state = 'NY';
SELECT first_name, last_name, city FROM voters WHERE city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT voter_id, address, city, state FROM voters ORDER BY voter_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM voter_history WHERE party_affiliation IS NOT NULL AND last_voted_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT voter_id, address_line1, address_line2, city, state, postal_code FROM voter_addresses WHERE state = 'CA';
